wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Joseph Sheil (born 19 June 1938) is a retired Northern Irish judge. He was a High Court Judge of Northern Ireland from 1989 to 2004, and a Lord Justice of Appeal of Northern Ireland from 2004 to 2007.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council

response: *19 June – John Sheil, lawyer and judge.

link_mentions.page: List of Northern Ireland members of the Privy Council of the United Kingdom

response: *Sir John Sheil (born 1938), Lord Justice of Appeal in Northern Ireland from 2005 to 2007
